AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: defendant, appellant, and passenger in a tractor-trailer with undocumented aliens, convicted of alien transportation offenses, traveled with co-defendant to Laredo, questioned by Agent Pena at an immigration checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: co-defendant, driver of the tractor-trailer, asked McMillon to accompany him to pick up commercial equipment, questioned by Agent Pena at an immigration checkpoint, gave consent for search of tractor's sleeper area
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena: Border Patrol Agent who approached the driver-side door at an immigration checkpoint near Freer, Texas, questioned Williams and McMillon, discovered a person hidden in the tractor's sleeper area
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Manuel Hernandez: Border Patrol Agent who prepared to have his canine perform a sniff of the tractor-trailer's exterior, worked with Agent Pena during the stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon and Zeba Williams: pair who traveled together from Houston to San Antonio and then to Laredo, questioned by Agent Pena at an immigration checkpoint
